meanings.definition: The substance of which a thing is made or composed.
meanings.sent1: The builder used strong material to construct the house.
meanings.sent2: The artist needed special material to create her sculpture.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on the pile of material meant for the new curtains!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the material that held their friendship together.
meanings.sent5: The detective carefully examined the material found at the crime scene.

meanings.sent1: The lawyer presented new material to support her case.
meanings.sent2: Studying the material before the test helped me succeed.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe you forgot the important material for the presentation!
meanings.sent4: The material she shared shed light on the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The journalist gathered material for the breaking news story.

meanings.sent1: She bought a beautiful material to make a dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: The tailor carefully cut the material for the new suit.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy chewed on the roll of material.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a soft material comforting him in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The designer showcased her latest collection of luxurious materials.
